short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for convenient xpub access

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy xpub management in your browser. View your addresses, receive bitcoin, and create payment labels. Functions as a very limited, read-only wallet.

Open source: https://github.com/jtormey/btc-ext
